text: Rudolf "Rudi" Assauer (30 April 1944 – 6 February 2019) was a German football manager and player. His nicknames were Stumpen-Rudi, or Cheroot Rudi. ==Life== He was born in Saarland, Germany. Assauer played for Borussia Dortmund from 1964 to 1970 and for Werder Bremen from 1970 to 1976. He managed Werder Bremen from 1978 to 1979 and again in 1980. He also managed Schalke 04 in 1981. In January 2012, aged 67, Assauer was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. He died from complications of the disease at his home in Gelsenkirchen, North Rhine- Westphalia on 6 February 2019 at the age of 74. ==Managerial statistics== Team From To Record Werder Bremen 20 December 1977 31 December 1977 Werder Bremen 29 January 1980 20 February 1980 Schalke 04 26 May 1981 30 June 1981 Schalke 04 20 January 1983 24 January 1983 Total — ==References== ==Other websites== * Assauer Sportmanagement AG site Category:1944 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:Sportspeople from Saarland Category:FC Schalke 04 managers
